about_the_game:
Dramatic, suspenseful, and mysterious, this pack has all you need to keep your players questioning, wondering, looking for answers. Will they find them? Leave your mysteries unresolved with Mysterious Unresolved Sounds Vol 1 from Bittersweet Entertainment. Featuring pulsing synths, questioning strings, dramatic piano, suspenseful percussion, haunting ambience, sparkling dark dreamy guitars, and modern techno synth-propelled themes, this pack contains 40 BGM perfect for your dramatic and suspenseful scenes.

Features:

40 royalty-free tracks for use in the game dev engine of your choice
BGM for all kinds of drama, suspense, and mysterious scenes
M4A and OGG formats included
